An account of the persecutions and oppressions of the Protestants in France Plaintes des Protestants cruellement opprimez dans le royaume de France. English Claude, Jean, 1619-1687.

Printed for J. Norris, London : 1686.
Attributed to Jean Claude. cf. NUC pre-1956. Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
